title: LARGE CORNER UNIT in Coolidge Corner! AMAZING LIGHT! Heat/HW Included!
posting_body: Beautiful brick apartment building in Coolidge Corner close to the Green Line T, shops, recreational facilities, restaurants, pubs, movie theatre, and more.
This gorgeous studio has gleaming hardwood floors, high ceilings, and huge windows!
The unit is in the corner on the top floor and gets unbelievable natural light!
Heat and hot water are included.
Off-street parking is available to rent.
The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.
